committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of taxes to be made with respect to certain lands co-managed by the Bureau of Land Management and the Secretary of the Army.

summary.text: Declares that a specified sector of the McGregor Range (New Mexico), which is co-managed by the Secretary of the Interior through the Bureau of Land Management under an agreement with the Secretary of the Army, shall be deemed to be land that the Secretary of the Interior administers through the Bureau of Land Management (thus making such land eligible for payments in lieu of taxes to local governments).

titles.title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of taxes to be made with respect to certain lands co-managed by the Bureau of Land Management and the Secretary of the Army.
